locations.name: vive la tarte
locations.summary: Lofty, industrial-chic Belgian bakery with an open kitchen for tarts, plus coffee, tea & juice.

locations.name: Chez Maman
locations.summary: Cozy, informal eatery serving French bistro classics ranging from burgers & crêpes to mussels.
locations.spiritualSignificance: We should pray for all the French people who come here.

locations.name: Sweet Maple
locations.summary: Local spot for homemade morning/lunch fare like signature brown-sugar-glazed 'millionaire’s bacon.'
locations.spiritualSignificance: We should pray for all the people who come here to eat brunch.

tasks.text: Put your name on the list.

locations.name: Salt&Straw
locations.summary: Quirky flavors & handmade waffle cones draw crowds to this artisanal ice cream maker.
locations.spiritualSignificance: This ice cream will change people's lives. Make sure to taste the monthly flavors, as well as the local ones.

tasks.text: Taste all of the ice cream.
Eat your ice cream before it melts.
Tell all your friends about this place.

locations.name: Mr. Holmes Bakehouse
locations.summary: Bakery serving a mix of tarts, donuts & croissant-muffins, plus coffee in a cozy, bright space.
locations.spiritualSignificance: Pray the cruffins haven't run out.

tasks.text: Order your cruffin and take a picture of it with the sign, then post on social media.

locations.name: Trestle
locations.summary: New American restaurant offering 3-course fixed-price meals in a quaint space with modern flair.
locations.spiritualSignificance: Pray people have enough money to give to the kingdom after eating here.
